BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES PARTNERSHIP TR

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO CREATE AN ENDOWMENT TO HELP PRESERVE ARCHIVAL RECORDS OF THE NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES AND TO MAKE THEM ACCESSIBLE THROUGH RESEARCH, EXHIBITS AND PUBLIC PROGRAMS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO CREATE AN ENDOWMENT TO HELP PRESERVE ARCHIVAL RECORDS OF THE NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES AND TO MAKE THEM ACCESSIBLE THROUGH RESEARCH, EXHIBITS AND PUBLIC PROGRAMS.
IRS990.Desc: TO REALIZE THE EDUCATIONAL POTENTIAL OF THE COLLECTIONS OF THE NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES THROUGH EFFECTIVE PROGRAMS FOR STUDENTS AND THE PUBLIC AS WELL AS TO ADVANCE THE PRESERVATION OF THOSE COLLECTIONS AND ENHANCE PUBLIC ACCESS TO THEM.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: THE MISSION OF THE TRUST AND THE SOLE FOCUS OF ITS ACTIVITIES AND ALL OF ITS EXPENDITURES IS TO ENSURE THE LONG-TERM ACCESS, AWARENESS, PRESERVATION, AND EDUCATIONAL USES OF THE ARCHIVAL RECORDS BELONGING TO THE STATE OF NEW YORK, ON BEHALF OF THE NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES - A PROGRAM OF THE NEW YORK STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT.
EXPLANATION FOR LACK OF IRS DETERMINATION OF STATUS FOR SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION: THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION OF THE TRUST IS THE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: INTENDED USES OF ENDOWMENT FUNDS: TO SUPPORT THE MISSION AND PURPOSE OF THE TRUST, WHICH IS TO HELP PRESERVE THE NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES AND TO MAKE THEM ACCESSIBLE THROUGH RESEARCH, EXHIBITS, AND PUBLIC PROGRAMS.
COMPLIANCE WITH THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE AWARD IS MONITORED THROUGH PERIODICAL REPORTS FILED BY THE RECIPIENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 REVIEW PROCEDURE: THE BOARD MEMBERS RECEIVE A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 IN ADVANCE OF FILING TO GIVE THEM THE OPPORTUNITY FOR A COMMENT/QUESTION PERIOD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION PROCEDURES: TRUST STAFF POSITIONS FOLLOW STATE CIVIL SERVICE POSITION SCHEDULES AND SALARY GUIDELINES. SALARY SCHEDULES ARE APPROVED ANNUALLY BY THE DIVISION OF THE BUDGET.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AVAILABILITY TO PUBLIC OF ORGANIZATION'S INFORMATION DOCUMENTS: THE TRUST MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, FEDERAL INFORMATION/TAX RETURNS (FORMS 990/990-T), AND NEW YORK REPORT/RETURN (FORMS CHAR500 AND CT-13) AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST AND ON THE TRUST'S WEBSITE. THE FORM 990 IS ALSO AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC ON WWW.GUIDESTAR.ORG AND THE CHAR500/FORM 990 ARE INCLUDED IN THE FILINGS WITH THE NEW YORK ATTORNEY GENERAL'S OFFICE AVAILABLE ON WWW.CHARITIESNYS.COM.
OTHER PROFESSIONAL FEES: PROGRAM SERVICE EXPENSES 104,304. MANAGEMENT AND GENERAL EXPENSES 165. FUNDRAISING EXPENSES 316. TOTAL EXPENSES 104,785.

NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES PARTNERSHIP TRUST (THE TRUST), A PUBLIC BENEFIT CORPORATION, WAS CREATED IN JULY 1992 UNDER ARTS AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK TO BUILD AN ENDOWMENT AND PROVIDE PROJECT SUPPORT TO HELP PRESERVE RECORDS OF THE NEW YORK STATE ARCHIVES AND TO MAKE THEM ACCESSIBLE THROUGH RESEARCH, EXHIBITS, AND EDUCATIONAL AND PUBLIC PROGRAMS. THE TRUST IS A COMPONENT UNIT OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK AND IS INCLUDED IN THE STATE'S BASIC FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
